superstore.translation[0].definitions[0]: a very large shop that sells a large variety of or one type of product
superstore.translation[1].definitions[0]: a large shop, often found on the outer part of a town, that sells a very large variety of a particular product such as furniture, computers etc
The proposals include plans to sell the cheaper models through low-cost superstores.
The office equipment superstore has closed outlets in four states.
